top-page.title:
Simple online 
rental applications
top-page.desc:
Stop looking and start planning your move. Create one
 application, save it, and submit it instantly to all your
 favorite rentals - for free.

text.desc:
Avoid paying multiple application fees. One profile to share with any landlord.
We make the process so simple.

text-start.title: Verified Identity
text-start.text: Successful renting starts with trust. Rentorr turns casual Internet visitors into names and faces so that you can feel more trusting in your rental dealings

text-center.title: Credit Check
text-center.text: We are more than a score. We work with industry leaders Compuscan to produce comprehensively detailed, yet easy to understand credit reports

text-end.title: Rental History
text-end.text: Writing down your previous addresses and landlord contact information is tedious. With your renter profile, your rental and employment histories are in one place

title-one.title: What makes Rentorr's tenant screening the best?

item.title: It won’t hurt your credit
item.text: Since you’re initiating the credit and background screening, it counts as a soft inquiry and won’t affect your credit score.

item.title: You get a copy
item.text: Once your credit report is completed, you can view a copy by logging into your Rentorr account.

item.title: Total Privacy Control
item.text: You control your information. Manage and revoke access anytime with just one click.

item.title: No waiting for results
item.text: Doing it all online means your screening is processed faster than traditional paperwork, so you can start moving in ASAP.

img-desc.title: Bank-level security means your personal information is safe
img-desc.text: Any time you provide Rentorr with your sensitive information, we know you are putting a lot of trust in our system. We protect all of your information with a 128-bit encryption, the same that every bank uses. We have also partnered with Compuscan to make sure all of the credit information is accurate and secure.

ready.title: Ready to start using Rentorr
ready.desc: It shouldn’t feel like a second job to live in a rental property. Rentorr was made to simplify the process and help you and your landlord have a better renting experience.
